column4: Ok guys, finally got my box to boot, but I'm getting some BIOS errors. Could someone help me understand what they mean?
No actually I haven't tried to Google the errors... I was hoping one of you knowledgeable people could help :)
if your getting BIOS errors you need to be on the phone with your motherboard manu, or getting a new board, or making sure you set everything correctly in BIOS.
